error.uploadChunk: Error uploading chunk. Retrying in {{timeout}} seconds.

uploads.dropzone: Drop files here or click to upload.

warning.cancelUpload: Are you sure you want to cancel uploading '{{filename}}'?
warning.cancelUploads: Are you sure you want to cancel all uploads?
warning.deleteCollection: Are you sure you want to move this collection to the trash?
warning.deleteFile: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
warning.deleteGroup: Are you sure you want to move this group to the trash?
warning.deleteIdentifier: Are you sure you want to delete '{{identifier}}'?
warning.deleteRecord: Are you sure you want to move this record to the trash?
warning.deleteTemplate: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
warning.deleteUser:
Are you sure you want to delete this user?
Please enter the username to confirm:
warning.fileChanged:
The content of the file you are currently editing changed since loading it.
Do you still want to overwrite it?
warning.maxFieldLength: Field cannot be longer than {{length}} characters.
warning.minFieldLength: Field must be at least {{length}} characters long.
warning.minMaxFieldLength: Field must be between {{minLength}} and {{maxLength}} characters long.
warning.purgeResourceTitle: Are you sure you want to permanently delete '{{title}}'?
warning.removeIdentifier: Are you sure you want to remove '{{identifier}}'?
warning.replaceUpload:
A file with the name '{{filename}}' already exists in the current record.
Do you want to replace it?
warning.resetCanvas: Are you sure you want to reset the canvas?
warning.restoreResourceTitle: Are you sure you want to restore '{{title}}'?
warning.uploadSizeDiffers:
The file you have selected has a different size than the previous upload.
Do you still want to continue?
